name: Rune Raiders
description:
See why Rune Raiders reached #1 RPG and #1 free game in MANY countries! Now, our new version is even better with the addition of the Ice Lands level pack and the Rocketeer!

The concept is very simple, you move your guys around with your finger. And when you do, they COME ALIVE AND FIGHT the bad guys. Rune Raiders a simple adventure game that takes SECONDS TO LEARN, but provides hilarious action for all!


"Am I allowed to just say that this is fantastic!?" -Touch Arcade forums.

"Wow. This game is unexpectedly addicting and great." -Touch Arcade forums.

"Simply put... THIS GAME ROCKS." -Touch Arcade Forums


Features:

-Ultra simple game play. No complicated tutorials or reading!

-14 heroes, each with 6 levels of upgrades!

-21 unique enemies!

-Hysterical quips that will make you smile!

-Fun, addictive game play that will keep you coming back for more.

-Story mode and survival mode.

-Game Center support with achievements and leader boards.
